subject: {{companyName}} {{companyEntityType}} {{financialYear}} Company Income Tax Return - {{taxAmount}} {{taxType}}{{payableDueDate}}
body:
Dear {{clientFirstName}},

Company Income Tax Return For The Year Ended In 30-JUNE-{{financialYear}}

We confirm we have completed {{companyName}} {{companyEntityType}} income tax return and, accordingly, please now find attached the following:

  • 2020 Company Income Tax Return (Client Copy) - showing {{taxAmount}} {{taxType}}.{{payableDueDate}} {{confirmBank}}
  • 2020 Financials
  • Directors Declaration - please sign the directors declaration and return to us.
  • Electronic Lodgement (ELD) Declaration form - please sign Part A{{signPartB}}, and return to our office for lodgement.
  • Our Invoice

{{additionalInfo}}


Would you kindly peruse the return and supporting schedules, and if in order, sign the ELD Declaration where indicated and return it to this office, retaining the Client Copy for your records.

A Declaration is also attached to the back of your copy of the return and is required to be retained by you for a period of 5 years, together with all receipts and documentary evidence in support of your return.
